@ mazigh & BLACKTROY: It's a false positive, lots of programs and games use dinput type keyloggers (hotkey and command detection).
You can add it to the exclusion list,.. if you don't trust it, download and install the trial version and you'll get the same warning. ;)

@ sgriff59: This is the Ultra 3D version (it says Ultra Version), there is no regular Ultra version.
There are 3 license versions available: Standard, Deluxe and Ultra 3D.
Versions Comparison: http://www.cyberlink.com/products/powerdvd/compare-retail_en_US.html

@ UnitedPirates: I can't post a hacking tutorial here, but here's a link to a topic from which I learned alot:

Here's another tip: Extract Setup.exe with 7-zip or Winrar and check Custom.ini

@ sgriff59: About the pic: It says "Upgrades all Your Media Experience to HD & 3D".
Make sure to check the 3D and the Upgrade button (blue with white arrow).
